Posts.Content: I'm starting mine on the 22nd. Hope things go well for you
Posts.Title: Due to start chemo 24th May

Posts.Content: I plan to take a famity holiday half way through chemo delaying treatment for an extra 2 weeks. Like you we have a villa booked before I knew. My doctor has said it's not ideal but then went on to say she thought it was a good idea for me to get away on a family holiday. So not a yes bur nor a no either
